review: Initially, I was very upset with Dr.Kahali as barely spoke and pressed for admission in CCU for my thorough examination including coronary angiography. The prima facie apparently rude behaviour of the doctor created a negative impression on me. So, I came back without listening to his advice. Actually, I should have listened. After few days, feeling acute chest pain and tightness in chest, I was compelled to be admitted in a reputed Heart Institute and carried out my Coronary Angiography and other tests in the same manner that was prescribed earlier. During my stay at that hospital, I found Dr.Kahalai talking well to his patients after their angiography and recommending them necessary medicines with careness. So, on 2nd thought based on my first hand experience, I would recommend Dr.Kahali. I am sorry for my initial review on that old man. He is surely an experienced doctor.
********* ******* given good advices. Very gentle behavior and was not behind only tests. I will refer this doctor to my friends.

Actually, it a routine checkup for my father a year ago the doctor had prescribed him CRDT machine so we had come for a check-up the doctor charge high fees & does not give time to the patient ** ****** ******* *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: **** *** ****** waited for 7 hours for checkup!! Poor behaviour with patient...When he was speaking with patient.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Very bad. Dr have not much time to brief patient health condition. Stuff are not being human.To much waiting time. Procedure are not smooth.
He is professional cardio and patient friendly. His prescriptions helped me. The doc said I am good. I feel satisfied.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very rude behaviour. Doesn't allow the patients to explain the issue. Very impolite personality. Terrible conduct during examination of the patient. Kept checking his phone while he kept us waiting. Didn't even tell us what should be the next course of action. Not recommend at all.

I have taken appointment and visited the hospital for cardiology concern, when we have visited the appointment we have to wait for long time, which I had faced lot of problem because I had travelled from distance for hospital. I would not like to revisit his hospital and II would not like to recommend this doctor for any only.

I was having cardiology concern so I had booked appointment with Dr. Dhiman Kahali and visited the hospital. In my appointment over all thing things were good only, but the doctor was not speaking more with patients. He was speaking more with other doctor only. There was long wait time in hospital for my appointment and I had to wait almost 3:30 hours for my appointment. If anyone needs cardiology consultation means I would like to recommend this  doctor.

I have taken appointment for my mother for cardiology concern and we have been to hospital. Doctor was good and he had done the check up, after the check up he had prescribed for some medicine to take for my mother and we are following that only. In hospital we did not find any difficult in our appointment as all thing went good only. I would like to recommend this doctor for other people also if required.
